lead_paragraph: An article on Wednesday about Juan Martín del Potro, the 20-year-old United States Open champion from Argentina, referred incorrectly to his hometown, Tandil. It is a city of about 110,000 residents; it is neither a “tiny town” nor a “tiny village” as it was characterized in different editions.
